events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as it does not fit and I am unhappy with the product.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to product dissatisfaction and incorrect fit.
Assigning the refund case to customer support agent specialized in returns and exchanges.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support regarding your jacket order. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
My order number is 54321. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn outside. It simply does not fit correctly.
Thank you for the details. I am processing your refund request now. Please send the jacket back using the provided prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick help! I will send it back today using the return label you sent.
We have received your returned jacket and issued a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and you have no further questions, we are closing the case now. Thank you for contacting support.
